mapper.insert: insert into team_apply_log (team_apply_log_id, team_id, apply_user_id, apply_remark, create_time) values (#{teamApplyLogId}, #{teamId},#{applyUserId}, #{applyRemark}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select apply_team_log_id, apply_team_id, apply_user_id, apply_user.name as apply_user_name, create_user_id, manager_id, create_user.name as create_user_name, manager_user.name as manager_user_name, apply_team.create_time, team.name as apply_team_name, apply_remark, status, process_remark, process_time, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, process_read_time, read_time from (((((apply_team inner join team on team_id = apply_team_id) inner join user_info apply_user on apply_user_id = user_id) inner join user_info create_user on create_user_id = create_user.user_id) inner join user_info manager_user on manager_user.user_id = manager_id) left outer join user_info process_user on process_user.user_id=process_user_id) where 1 = 1 and apply_team_log_id=#{applyId}
